p: Data on the region, gender, and age (distributed according to 3 classes: young 6–11 months, adult 12–83 months, senior ≥ 84 months) were recorded. This study was ethically approved by the Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee of the University of Crete Medical School and conform with the European Union Directive 2010/63/EU regarding use of animals and biological specimens in research, as well as the relevant Hellenic legislation (Presidential Decree 160/91, under the Code Numbers 31 EE 05, 31 EPR 04 and 31EP 020). Written informed consent was obtained from the dog owners, according to the aforementioned national legislations.
